mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS id, p.title AS title, DATE_FORMAT(p.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS createdAt, DATE_FORMAT(p.updated_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS updatedAt, p.writer AS writer, p.views AS views, c.name AS categoryName FROM posts p JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.id WHERE p.is_deleted = false
